price: 46. « Ne craignez rien, dit Allah, Je suis avec vous, J’Entends et Je Vois.
arabic: قَالَ لَا تَخَافَآۖ إِنَّنِي مَعَكُمَآ أَسۡمَعُ وَأَرَىٰ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: qāla lā takhāfā innanī maʿakumā asmaʿu wa-arā
